lines.text: We're gonna die, Spence! We're gonna die!
No we're not...
I still have orders!
Do I smell like onions?
No. Do I?
Why's she called The Hummer?
She can't whistle while she works so she hums.

[Knocks on door and Spence opens it]
Good evening.
Boy, it sure looks that way. Can I take your coat?
Sure.
[Sheds fur coat and walks into the bedroom wearing only panties]
It's a real Art Deco!
Never heard of the bum!
Your brother could con a leopard out of its stripes.
All right, you've got to distract them.
I'VE got to?
So I can place the bet.
They're looking for YOU! You're the perfect attention-getter!
You don't care if I get killed?
I don't want ANYBODY getting killed, starting with ME!
Will that be check or cash?
Well... how much are we talking about, here?
Ten thousand.
Whoah, come on, sweetheart. That's a little high, don't you think?
I'm really not at liberty to say.
Well, if YOU'RE not at liberty...
Wait a minute, wait a minute. I don't think you two are talking about the same thing.
What are you talking about?
No, no. What are YOU talking about?
The piano.
What piano?
The one that Mr. Powell just purchased.
WHAT?
I was afraid of that...

[on phone]
Ah, hello, boss?
[Spence drives by and demolishes Binky's car door]
YOU CRAZY SON OF A BITCH! No, no, no, no, no, boss! Not you! Not you! I would NEVER say anything like that to you!

[Spence has snuck up to Claudia's bedroom to surprise her]
Good morning!
[Claudia wakes up startled]

[Spence holds up her panties]
In your rush you forgot these.
This is a Cadillac without doors.
So what? It's a Cadillac.
